roleset.name: to leave by will, hand down
roleset.note: BEQUEATH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bequeath' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from bequeath.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Mr. Hubbard , who [*T*-1] died in 1986 , bequeathed the copyrights on his writings to his church , which [*T*-2]licensed them to New Era Publications , a Danish corporation .
example.arg: his church , which [*T*-2] licensed them to New Era Publications , a Danish corporation
